column2: an A.M. Eatery////The best brunch variety in Houston atm. I've been to the Snooze on Montrose and their location in Town and Country several times. The food is always great. The Montrose location is nice
column3: but there was a really aggressive homeless guy pestering people in line last time. He literally tried starting fights with every guy asking them to buy him alcohol then yelling obscenities at them when they refused
column4: but anyway..here's what you're here for:
